short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects the JavaScript framework used on a website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Framework Lens: Instantly Identify Web Technologies

Uncover the magic behind your favorite websites with Framework Lens! This lightweight Chrome extension reveals the JavaScript frameworks and libraries powering the web pages you visit.

Key Features:
🚀 Instant Detection: Click the extension icon to immediately identify the framework used on any website.
🔍 Comprehensive Coverage: Recognizes popular frameworks like React, Vue.js, Angular, Svelte, and many more.
💡 Educational Tool: Perfect for developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts to learn about web technologies.
🛠️ Web Development Aid: Quickly understand the tech stack of inspirational websites.
🎓 Learning Resource: Ideal for students and beginners exploring different web frameworks.
